sourcesContent:
Films

{{ film.opening_crawl }}

Director: {{ film.director }}

Producer: {{ film.producer }}

Release: {{ film.release_date }}

# Name Height Mass Hair Color Skin Color Eye Color Birth Year Gender
1 Luke Skywalker 172 77 blond fair blue 19BBY male
2 Luke Skywalker 172 77 blond fair blue 19BBY male
3 Luke Skywalker 172 77 blond fair blue 19BBY male
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-films-component', templateUrl: './films.component.html' }) export class FilmsComponent { public results: Results[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient) { http.get("https://swapi.dev/api/films").subscribe(result => { this.results = result.results; }, error => console.error(error)); } } interface Film { count: string; results: Results[]; } interface Results { title: string; episode_id: number; opening_crawl: string; director: string; producer: string; release_date: string; characters: string[]; charactersInfo: Character[]; } interface Character { name: string; height: string; mass: string; hair_color: string; skin_color: string; eye_color: string; birth_year: string; gender: string }
